name: Jelly Terror
description:
Escape a wave of terrifying jellyfish in this aquatic arcade adventure! Collect chests and batteries to keep your speed high and get a high score on the high seas!

Controls: Left and Right arrow keys or A and D to rotate. Left and Right on Stick or D-Pad on controller.

Derek Baert - Programming

Eric Proulx - Programming, Level Design, Music

Levi Zacharias - Art, Spaceship designer

Ruiguang Nie - Art

Winson Ta - Art, Social Media Manager, Graphic design, Team mascot

Special thanks to MOSMA for the sound effects
